text: Max Ordman (17 June 1926 - 12 January 2002) was a South African wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2002 deaths Category:South African male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of South Africa Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Germiston Category:Sportspeople from Gauteng
title: Max Ordman
